title: Authors and Citation
text: Hyndman R (2026). pkgmeta: Find details R packages CRAN github. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/robjhyndman/pkgmeta/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {pkgmeta: Find details about R packages on CRAN or github},   author = {Rob Hyndman},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/robjhyndman/pkgmeta/}, }

what: Find details about R packages on CRAN or github
title: Find details about R packages on CRAN or github
text: package just one function: get_meta retrieves metadata R packages CRAN GitHub. can optionally return download data packages CRAN.

title: Find details about R packages on CRAN or github
text: can install development version pkgmeta GitHub :

title: Find details about R packages on CRAN or github
text: Fetch meta data packages given list authors CRAN: Fetch meta data list packages CRAN: Fetch meta data list packages GitHub: Combine meta data CRAN GitHub:
code: library(pkgmeta) get_meta(   cran_authors = c("Hyndman", "O'Hara-Wild"),   include_downloads = TRUE, start = "2024-01-01" ) #> # A tibble: 73 × 11 #>    package        date       title    description version authors url   cran_url #>    <chr>          <date>     <chr>    <chr>       <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>    #>  1 bayesforecast  2021-06-17 "Bayesi… "Fit Bayes… 1.0.1   "Asael… http… https:/… #>  2 bfast          2024-10-22 "Breaks… "Decomposi… 1.7.0   "Jan V… http… https:/… #>  3 binb           2024-07-06 "'binb'… "A collect… 0.0.7   "Dirk … http… https:/… #>  4 cricketdata    2025-03-25 "Intern… "Data on i… 0.3.0   "Rob H… http… https:/… #>  5 demography     2023-02-08 "Foreca… "Functions… 2.0     "Rob H… http… https:/… #>  6 DescTools      2025-03-28 "Tools … "A collect… 0.99.60 "Andri… http… https:/… #>  7 distributional 2024-09-17 "Vector… "Vectorise… 0.5.0   "Mitch… http… https:/… #>  8 eechidna       2021-02-25 "Explor… "Data from… 1.4.1   "Jerem… http… https:/… #>  9 expsmooth      2015-04-09 "Data S… "Data sets… 2.3     "Rob J… http… https:/… #> 10 fable          2024-11-05 "Foreca… "Provides … 0.4.1   "Mitch… http… https:/… #> # ℹ 63 more rows #> # ℹ 3 more variables: github_url <chr>, first_download <date>, downloads <dbl> get_meta(   cran_packages = c("vital", "nullabor"),   include_downloads = TRUE, start = "2024-01-01" ) #> # A tibble: 2 × 11 #>   package date       title description version authors url   cran_url github_url #>   <chr>   <date>     <chr> <chr>       <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>      #> 1 nullab… 2025-02-10 "Too… "Tools for… 0.3.15  "Hadle… http… https:/… https://g… #> 2 vital   2024-06-21 "Tid… "Analysing… 1.1.0   "Rob H… http… https:/… https://g… #> # ℹ 2 more variables: first_download <date>, downloads <dbl> get_meta(github_repos = c("robjhyndman/vital", "dicook/nullabor")) #> # A tibble: 2 × 7 #>   package  date       title                     version authors url   github_url #>   <chr>    <date>     <chr>                     <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>      #> 1 vital    2025-03-27 Tidy Analysis Tools for … 1.1.0.… "Rob H… http… https://g… #> 2 nullabor 2025-02-10 Tools for Graphical Infe… 0.3.15  "Hadle… http… https://g… get_meta(   cran_packages = c("vital", "nullabor"),   github_repos = c("robjhyndman/vital", "dicook/nullabor"),   include_downloads = TRUE, start = "2024-01-01" ) #> # A tibble: 2 × 11 #>   package date       title description version authors url   cran_url github_url #>   <chr>   <date>     <chr> <chr>       <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>      #> 1 vital   2024-06-21 "Tid… "Analysing… 1.1.0   "Rob H… http… https:/… https://g… #> 2 nullab… 2025-02-10 "Too… "Tools for… 0.3.15  "Hadle… http… https:/… https://g… #> # what: Return meta data on CRAN and github packages — get_meta
title: Return meta data on CRAN and github packages — get_meta
text: Find meta data packages CRAN match given author packages contained vector github repositories return tibble. Meta data packages CRAN github combined single row. meta data clash, CRAN version preferred prefer_cran TRUE, otherwise github version preferred.

title: Return meta data on CRAN and github packages — get_meta
code: get_meta(   cran_authors = NULL,   include_downloads = FALSE,   start = "2000-01-01",   end = Sys.Date(),   cran_packages = NULL,   github_repos = NULL,   prefer_cran = TRUE )

title: Return meta data on CRAN and github packages — get_meta
text: cran_authors Character vector find CRAN author names include_downloads total CRAN downloads since start added tibble? start Start date download statistics. Ignored include_downloads FALSE. end End date download statistics. Ignored include_downloads FALSE. cran_packages Character vector CRAN packages. Ignored cran_authors provided. github_repos Character vector github repos prefer_cran package CRAN github, information preferenced?

title: Return meta data on CRAN and github packages — get_meta
code: get_meta(cran_authors = "Hyndman") #> # A tibble: 51 × 9 #>    package           date       title description version authors url   cran_url #>    <chr>             <date>     <chr> <chr>       <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>    #>  1 bayesforecast     2025-06-05 "Bay… "Fit Bayes… 1.0.5   "Asael… http… https:/… #>  2 bfast             2025-08-18 "Bre… "Decomposi… 1.7.1   "Jan V… http… https:/… #>  3 binb              2024-07-06 "'bi… "A collect… 0.0.7   "Dirk … http… https:/… #>  4 calcal            2025-07-22 "Cal… "An R impl… 1.0.0   "Rob H… http… https:/… #>  5 conformalForecast 2025-10-06 "Con… "Methods a… 0.1.0   "Xiaoq… http… https:/… #>  6 cricketdata       2025-03-25 "Int… "Data on i… 0.3.0   "Rob H… http… https:/… #>  7 demography        2025-10-06 "For… "Functions… 2.0.1   "Rob H… http… https:/… #>  8 DescTools         2025-03-28 "Too… "A collect… 0.99.60 "Andri… http… https:/… #>  9 distributional    2024-09-17 "Vec… "Vectorise… 0.5.0   "Mitch… http… https:/… #> 10 eechidna          2021-02-25 "Exp… "Data from… 1.4.1   "Jerem… http… https:/… #> # what: pkgmeta: Find details about R packages on CRAN or github — pkgmeta-package
title: pkgmeta: Find details about R packages on CRAN or github — pkgmeta-package
text: Finds meta data packages CRAN match given author packages contained specified github repositories.

title: pkgmeta: Find details about R packages on CRAN or github — pkgmeta-package
